head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials DONO, MARYANN, RN, BSN, MA. THE ALUMNI ASSOCIATION OF ST. VINCENT'S HOSPITAL SCHOOL OF NURSING NOTES WITH DEEP SADNESS THE TRAGIC DEATH OF OUR FRIENDS AND ALUMNI IN THE MATERNAL CHILD HEALTH DIVISION: MARYANN DONO '60 (SECRETARY, TREASURER); MARY ANN GOING '61; KATHLEEN MOLLICK '57; AND JOAN ELLEN WALSH '64. THEY WERE PROUD TO CALL THEMSELVES ST. VINCENT'S NURSES, AND WE ARE PROUD TO CALL THEM COLLEAGUES. CONTRIBUTIONS MAY BE MADE TO THE ST. VINCENT'S NURSES MEMORIAL FUND, C

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials DONO, MARYANN, RN, BSN, MA. THE ALUMNI ASSOCIATION OF ST. VINCENT'S HOSPITAL SCHOOL OF NURSING NOTES WITH DEEP SADNESS THE TRAGIC DEATH OF OUR FRIENDS AND ALUMNI IN THE MATERNAL CHILD HEALTH DIVISION: MARYANN DONO '60 (SECRETARY, TREASURER); MARY ANN GOING '61; KATHLEEN MOLLICK '57; AND JOAN ELLEN WALSH '64. THEY WERE PROUD TO CALL THEMSELVES ST. VINCENT'S NURSES, AND WE ARE PROUD TO CALL THEM COLLEAGUES. CONTRIBUTIONS MAY BE MADE TO THE ST. VINCENT'S NURSES MEMORIAL FUND, C

block.p: DONO-Maryann, RN, BSN, MA. The Alumni Association of St. Vincent's Hospital School of Nursing notes with deep sadness the tragic death of our friends and alumni in the Maternal Child Health Division: Maryann Dono '60 (Secretary-Treasurer); Mary Ann Going '61; Kathleen Mollick '57; and Joan Ellen Walsh '64. They were proud to call themselves St. Vincent's nurses, and we are proud to call them colleagues. Contributions may be made to the St. Vincent's Nurses Memorial Fund, C Development, St. Vincent's HospitalManhattan, 153 West 11th Street, New York, New York 10011. Joan J. Caruana '61, President & the Board of Directors

DONO-Maryann, RN, BSN, MA. The Alumni Association of St. Vincent's Hospital School of Nursing notes with deep sadness the tragic death of our friends and alumni in the Maternal Child Health Division: Maryann Dono '60 (Secretary-Treasurer); Mary Ann Going '61; Kathleen Mollick '57; and Joan Ellen Walsh '64. They were proud to call themselves St. Vincent's nurses, and we are proud to call them colleagues. Contributions may be made to the St. Vincent's Nurses Memorial Fund, C Development, St. Vincent's HospitalManhattan, 153 West 11th Street, New York, New York 10011. Joan J. Caruana '61, President & the Board of Directors
